gen.selecttable: Please select the data table to generate code first
gen.ForcedSync: Are you sure you want to forcibly synchronize the table structure of
gen.completetable: Please complete the table content first
gen.Permanentlydeleted: This operation will permanently delete the file. Do you want to continue?
gen.Verificationfailed: The form verification failed. Please recheck the submitted content

gencode.formValidation: Form validation failed, please recheck the submission
gencode.moduleNameMemo: It can be understood as a subsystem name, such as system, user, tool (general folder collation)
gencode.businessNameMemo: It can be understood as a functional English name, such as user
gencode.functionNameMemo: Used as class descriptions, e.g. user, code generation, article system
gencode.ParentmenuMemo: Assign to a specified menu, such as System Administration
gencode.defCustomPath: The default is a custom path
gencode.CustomPathMemo: Enter the absolute path to the disk, if not, it will be generated under the current Web project
gencode.genPath: The front-end code path is configured under the back-end configuration file gen->vuePath
gencode.isRepositoryMemo: Unchecked code will not generate the corresponding Lps.Repository code
gencode.isMenuMemo: The menu is automatically added to the menu bar
gencode.treeCodeMemo: The tree displays the coded field name, such as dept_id
gencode.treeNameMemo: The display name field name of the tree node, for example dept_name
gencode.treeParentCodeMemo: The tree displays the parent coded field name, such as parent_Id
gencode.subTableName: The table name of the associated child table
gencode.subTableNameMemo: The table name of the associated child table, such as sys_user
gencode.subTableFkName: The foreign key name associated with the child table
gencode.subTableFkNameMemo: The foreign key name associated with the child table, for example user_id
